description: Developed the frontend for the restaurant ordering system using React and TypeScript
Collaborated in the softwaredevelopment of MedMisti, a companion app for smart nebuliser devices.
Supported student teams in the IT projects to develop software solutions for the university research office. Guided teams through software development process, facilitating workshop every week.
Implemented UI test automation for SideChef's web application using TypeScript and Playwright framework. Improved test coverage by 15% and supported supervisor in streamlining the test suite.
